page.title: 13Employment in Tenby area
page.content: The area that we studied was 2 private estates,one council estate,the village of New Hedges and neighbouring roads. They proved that more households had two people working in them than one person. Thirty one households had 2 people working and 29 households had one person working.In two cases three people worked and in two other houses four people worked. There were 18 people unemployed most of them retired,nearly all of these were living on a private estate called Upper Hill Park.The number of people unemployed is far lower than in the centre of Tenby,which has quite a high unemployment figure.
